overview:
Anaesthetics India Private Limited

Anaesthetics India Pvt. Ltd.Driven by technology, Anaesthetics India pioneers the Indian health care equipment industry. Since its inception in 1951, the company has been able to substantially improve the quality of medical treatment and critical health care through import substitution of costly equipment. During the last six decades of its existence, Anaesthetics India has developed cheaper alternatives of Critical Care, Oxygen Therapy and Anaesthesia equipment besides its Ancillaries.

Our pursuit to achieve excellence in all the spheres of our business is aptly reflected by means of ISO 9001: 2000 & ISO 13485:2003 certification. We follow stringent quality control system to ensure the quality of our products and the complete range of our products, manufactured in compliance with WHO-GMP guidelines, are CE marked.

Phone : +(91)-(22)-66952980/66952984/65229352
